member.name: T:Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimArchitectureConventions
member.summary: A class representing the conventions we use for processor specific Geometry Engine library

member.name: P:Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimArchitectureConventions.Suffix
member.summary: The suffix we apply to platform-specific assemblys in the current process architecture

member.name: P:Xbim.Geometry.Engine.Interop.XbimArchitectureConventions.SubFolder
member.summary: The default subfolder to look for platform-specific assemblys in the current process architecture
